com.cmput301.cs.project.models

Class Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.cs.project.models.Tag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Tag>

    public class Tag
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Tag>
    Class that contains a name and a unique ID that a user can associate with a Claim. A Claim can hold any number of tags that are associated with the claimant (User)

    Specific tags are bound to a User (device).

    Creating a new Tag: 

         final TagsManager manager = …;
     final String name = …;
     final Tag tag = manager.getTagByName(name);

    Editing an Existing Tag: 

         final Tag oldTag = …;
     final String newName = …;
     final TagsManager manager = …;
     final newTag = manager.renameTag(oldTag, newName);
     // oldTag should be discarded
    The Parcelable implementation allows the tags to be passed into and pulled out of intents by using Intent#putExtra(String, Parcelable) and Intent#getParcelableExtra(String) respectively.

    Each tag is given a random unique id upon construction.

    Author:
    rozsa, jbenson
